alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Passaic, south central Bergen, central Essex, Queens, Richmond, Kings and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bloomfield, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Passaic and Bloomfield around 335 PM EDT. Lyndhurst and Rutherford around 340 PM EDT. Newark and Secaucus around 345 PM EDT. Union City around 350 PM EDT. Jersey City and Bayonne around 355 PM EDT. Lower East Side and Brooklyn Heights around 400 PM EDT. Flatbush and Crown Heights around 405 PM EDT. Coney Island and Canarsie around 410 PM EDT. Rockaway Beach and Kennedy Airport around 415 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Queens
